name: .BASH_HISTORY File Extension
summary: Learn about .BASH_HISTORY files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File created by Bash, a Unix-based shell program commonly used on Mac OS X and Linux operating systems; stores a history of user commands entered at the command prompt; used for viewing old commands that have been executed.

content: BASH_HISTORY files are hidden files with no filename prefix. They always use the filename .bash_history.
NOTE: Bash is the shell program used by Apple Terminal.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
